doc.title: 21 Below
doc.plot: 21 BELOW is an intimate portrait of a middle class family from Buffalo, NY. Comprised entirely of scenes from their lives, it reveals their economic, social, and interpersonal struggles. It documents their fight to stay together while the pressures of their world threaten to tear them apart.
